title: Jorgenson Tightens Grip on GC After Wild Ride at Paris-Nice, Breakaway Survivor Fends off Superstar Chase at Tirreno
content:
No Vingegaard, no problem as Visma-Lease a Bike blow up Paris-Nice in echelon attack and set up Jorgenson for bonus-seconds raid.

Read the full article at Jorgenson Tightens Grip on GC After Wild Ride at Paris-Nice, Breakaway Survivor Fends off Superstar Chase at Tirreno on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
